DOC.brief_title: Delinieation GIP 's Effects During Meal Humans Using GIP Receptor Antagoniasation ( GA-4 )
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : To evaluate role GIPR signal postprandial physiology , include lipid , bone glucose homeostasis , use naturally occur GIP fragment , antagonise GIPR . Twelve healthy men ( age 18-70 year , BMI 19-27 kg/m2 ) normal kidney liver parameter haemoglobin level first-degree relative type 2 diabetes include randomise , double-blinded , placebo-controlled cross-over study . Study consist four study day concomitant infusion A ) GIP-A , B ) GLP-1 receptor antagonist Exendin [ 9-39 ] , C ) GIP-A + Exendin [ 9-39 ] , D ) saline ( placebo ) .
DOC.criteria: Normal kidney function , liver function hemoglobin level . Medication , Diabetes type 1 2 , BMI > 27 , first degree relative Type 2 Diabetes
